title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Corruption and failures of the National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program or “Vaccine Court”Wayne Rohde is... <!--more--> a co-founder of the Vaccine Safety Council of Minnesota and the Autism Advocacy Coalition of Minnesota.. He is also a national advisory member of Health Choice.  Wayne has twin sons, age 17, Nicholas and Austin.  Nicholas was vaccine injured at 13 months by the MMR and later diagnosed with regressive autism.
  He has advocated extensively in Minnesota, Oklahoma and nationally for autism health insurance reform, vaccination choice, safety and research, and improved educational, employment and residential services for people with autism.
He is the author of the recent book “The Vaccine Court: The Dark Truth of America’s Vaccine Injury Compensation Program.”
